item.title: Smart Glasses: The Future? Hype, Hope, & Privacy Worries
item.description: Smart glasses are back! But are they useful tech or a privacy nightmare? Learn what they do and the big questions they raise for your daily life.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: iPhone Designer's New Goal: Get You Off Your Screen
item.description: Jony Ive, the designer behind the iPhone, is exploring screenless tech. Learn why he thinks it's the future and what it could mean for your daily life, reducing screen time.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: Does Your Computer Remember Everything You Do? The Truth About Recall
item.description: A new Windows feature called Recall records everything you do on your PC. Learn what it is, why privacy experts are worried, and how to turn it off to protect your digital life.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: Will AI Take Your Job? What's Really Happening
item.description: Worried about AI taking your job? Discover how AI is really changing work, which tasks are affected, and the human skills that matter most in the future.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: When AI Makes Up Facts: Why Online Info Gets Weird
item.description: Discover why AI sometimes makes up information (called 'hallucinations') and how these fake facts are appearing in articles and online. Learn how to spot them.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: Is That Really Your Friend Calling? It Could Be an AI Scam
item.description: Learn about AI voice cloning scams that sound just like people you know. Discover how they work and get essential tips to spot fake calls and protect yourself.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: Fighting Fake Online: New Law Helps Stop Harmful Deepfakes
item.description: Worried about fake photos & videos online? Discover how a new US law is helping victims fight back against harmful deepfakes and get them taken down.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: Who Makes the Rules for AI? Why It Matters to You
item.description: AI affects your job, loans, and what you see online. Learn why the global debate over who makes the rules for artificial intelligence is shaping your future.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: When AI Acts Weird: Why Your Tech Messes Up
item.description: Ever wonder why your smart tech acts weird? Learn the simple reasons AI sometimes makes mistakes, from smart speakers to autocorrect, and what it means for your daily life.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: The App Store War: How Apple vs Fortnite Affects Your Phone
item.description: The legal battle between Apple and Fortnite isn't just about a game. Learn how this fight over the App Store could change app prices, choices, and security on your phone.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: Your Phone's Secret Offline Brain
item.description: Discover how your smartphone is getting a powerful AI brain right on the device. Learn how this makes your phone faster, more private, and works even without internet.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: The Surprising Energy Cost of AI: Why It Matters to You
item.description: Discover the hidden energy cost behind AI tools like voice assistants & image generators. Learn how powering AI impacts electricity grids, the environment, and your digital life.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: Oops! When AI Gets It Wrong: Funny Tech Fails Explained
item.description: Ever seen AI do something weird? Discover why chatbots, games, and other tech make funny, unexpected mistakes, what it means for you, and why it's surprisingly common.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: Who Really Owns Your Smart Gadgets? The Surprising Truth
item.description: When you buy a smartphone or smart TV, do you really own it? Discover the surprising control tech companies keep over your devices and what it means for you.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: Could Your Phone Get 'Secret Service' Security?
item.description: Google's Advanced Protection offers extreme phone security for high-risk users. Learn how this 'digital fort knox' works and how its tech could make *your* phone safer in the future.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: Can AI Be Tricked? Why It Matters for Your Money
item.description: Discover the surprising ways artificial intelligence can be fooled by simple tricks. Learn why this hidden weakness matters for your online money and personal data.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: AI Can Now Design Real Objects You Can Actually Make
item.description: AI isn't just making digital art anymore! Discover how artificial intelligence is now designing real, physical objects you can build, and what it means for the future of products and design.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: When Your Favorite App Goes Bust: What Happens to Your Data?
item.description: Ever wonder what happens to your photos, messages, and personal info when a tech company you use goes bankrupt? Learn if your data is sold, deleted, or ends up in limbo.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: The TikTok Trend Breaking School Laptops
item.description: Discover how a viral TikTok trend is leading students to damage school laptops and why this costs real money and affects learning. Understand the impact of online trends.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: Could Using AI Make You Look Less Capable at Work?
item.description: You use AI to boost productivity, but could it make colleagues question your skills? Learn how to use AI smartly at work without accidentally hurting your professional image.
item.dc:creator: Gemini

item.title: Say Goodbye to Slow Airplane Wi-Fi: It's Getting Way Faster
item.description: Frustrated by slow Wi-Fi on flights? Discover why airplane internet has been terrible and how new satellite tech is finally making it fast enough for streaming, video calls, and more.

item.title: Engineering Strategies for Black-Box AI Models
item.description: Learn practical engineering strategies to manage the opacity of black-box AI models. Explore architectural patterns, testing, and monitoring techniques for building reliable systems.

item.title: Engineering Resilience Against Open Source Instability
item.description: Modern technology relies heavily on open source, facing risks from underfunding and burnout. Learn technical strategies like SBOMs, scanning, and architectural patterns to build resilience against OSS instability.

item.title: Engineering Under Restriction: Navigating Chip Controls & Tech Scrutiny
item.description: Explore how engineers are adapting tech design, supply chains, and strategy in an era of geopolitical chip controls, investment scrutiny, and market fragmentation. Build resilience.

item.description: Learn how to engineer AI systems that meet regulatory demands for transparency, fairness, and accountability. Explore strategies for building explainable, auditable, and safe AI models.

item.description: Broadcom's acquisition of VMware brings major licensing changes. Learn how enterprise architects and engineers can navigate cost pressures, re-evaluate infrastructure, and explore alternatives.

item.title: Engineering Resilience: Architecting Systems Against Platform 'Enshittification'
item.description: Learn how to architect resilient systems that withstand platform 'enshittification'. Explore strategies like abstraction, graceful degradation, and reducing vendor lock-in to protect your application.

item.description: Discover how open source projects can leverage AI while combating 'AI slop' through robust engineering controls and strong community strategies for sustainable quality.

item.description: Combatting the rise of low-quality 'AI slop' in open source. Learn how maintainers can engineer quality through enhanced processes, code review, and smart tooling.

item.description: Learn why reliable predictive AI is critical for autonomous vehicles, explore lessons from robotaxi failures, and discover engineering strategies for building safer systems.

item.description: Explore the engineering challenges of adapting mobile app architectures to comply with diverse app store regulations, including alternative payments, and discover effective architectural strategies.

item.description: Explore the unique threats posed by malicious AI agents and learn essential engineering principles and advanced strategies for building robust defenses against autonomous AI threats.

item.description: Explore the backend engineering challenges of building a secure FIDO/WebAuthn Relying Party for passwordless authentication, covering credential management and protocol verification.

item.description: Master integrating AI tools like Copilot into your developer workflow for productivity gains. Learn strategies for coding, debugging, testing, and ensuring quality & security in AI-augmented development.

item.description: Explore the unique challenges of engineering software for color E Ink displays. Learn strategies for tackling slow refresh rates, limited color, and ghosting.

item.description: Explore the engineering challenges and strategies for integrating passkeys. Learn about WebAuthn, backend complexities, and UX design for a passwordless future.

item.description: Learn how modern attackers bypass traditional MFA and discover essential engineering strategies, including FIDO2, session binding, and conditional access, to build resilient authentication systems.

item.description: Explore the engineering challenges and architectural shifts required to implement external payment options in mobile apps amidst evolving platform rules like the DMA.

item.description: Explore how AI is transforming software supply chain attacks with automation and sophistication. Learn essential engineering defenses to build resilience against these advanced threats.

item.title: Engineering Large AI Models on Mobile: Architecture & Challenges
item.description: Explore the architecture & engineering challenges of integrating large AI models like Apple Intelligence & Gemini Nano directly onto mobile devices, covering performance, privacy, & resource management.

item.description: Bridge the gap between lab accuracy and real-world reliability for AIoT. Explore engineering challenges in data, models, deployment, and uncertainty management for critical IoT systems.

item.title: Technical Guide: Leveraging Open-Source AI Models for Development
item.description: Unlock the power of open-source AI models for your development projects. This technical guide covers selecting, deploying, and fine-tuning models like Llama, offering cost savings, flexibility, and control.

item.title: Analyzing Security Risks Introduced by AI Code Dependencies
item.description: AI coding assistants boost speed but risk security via dependencies. Explore dangers like hallucinated packages, outdated versions, and insecure use, plus mitigation strategies.

item.title: Juice Jacking Defenses: How a 'Trivial' Bypass Exposed Mobile Risks
item.description: Explore the technical flaws that allowed a 'trivial' bypass of mobile OS defenses against juice jacking, exposing data theft risks via public USB charging ports.

item.description: Discover technical strategies for managing the End-of-Life (EOL) of cloud-connected hardware. Learn about challenges like cloud dependency, firmware updates, secure data handling, and security risks.

item.description: Explore the technical privacy risks of smart tags like AirTag & Tile. This deep dive analyzes BLE operation, tracking threats, and technical countermeasures implemented to protect user privacy.

item.description: Integrating Generative AI (LLMs) into search presents huge technical hurdles. Explore challenges like hallucination, latency, and source attribution, comparing Google AI Overviews & Perplexity.

item.title: Deep Dive: Building with OpenAI o4-mini's Tool Use Capabilities
item.description: Explore OpenAI's o4-mini and its powerful tool use (function calling) capabilities. Learn why these cost-effective, fast models are ideal for building intelligent applications with our technical deep dive and API guide.

item.description: Explore how Google Messages uses on-device ML via Android SafetyCore to blur sensitive images locally, enhancing mobile privacy without uploading data. A technical deep dive.

item.description: Unpack the risks of Node.js dependencies, analyze recent supply chain attacks like coa/rc hijacks, and learn actionable strategies to secure your projects.

item.description: Google paused its third-party cookie phase-out. Explore the technical reasons, the challenges with Privacy Sandbox, and what this revised plan means for web developers and the AdTech ecosystem.

item.description: Deep dive into Windows Recall security, analyzing its architecture, potential attack vectors, identified vulnerabilities, and mitigation strategies for users and organizations.

item.description: Explore advanced security threats to AI models beyond prompt injection, including data poisoning, adversarial examples, and model inversion. Understand these technical risks and mitigation strategies.

item.description: Learn how to engineer reliable task-specific AI agents. Explore technical architectures and strategies to prevent confabulation (hallucinations) and maintain consistent persona for trustworthy AI.

item.description: Explore Google DeepMind's CaMeL framework, a novel architectural approach to defend against prompt injection, OWASP's top LLM security threat. Learn how it works.
